content: **create for yourself or a friend a very useful and practical bowl cozy note if you plan on placing this in the actual microwave you will need a 100% cotton yarn or 100% natural fiber yarn do not use a yarn with synthetic fibers if you plan on microwaving ** **size ** small medium large - diameter across top 5 75 6 25 6 75 /14 5 16 17 cm **this will work best on bowls that have straight sides with no ledge/lip at the top and ones that do not have a very wide bottom** **stitches & techniques used ** chains slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet extended double_crochet working in the third loop working in the back loop only **yarn ** #4 worsted weight 75 90 105 yards of lion brand 24/7 cotton or suitable substitute of 100% cotton **tools ** us size g/6 4 0 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer
